headline: Why Shares of Bloom Energy Are Rocketing Higher Today
summary: One customer sees fuel cells as a smart way to meet the high power demands for AI computing.

headline: Bloom Energy Jumps 15.7% After AEP Discloses $2.65B Fuel Cell Deal
summary: AEP says its unregulated unit exercised an option for up to 1,000 MW of Bloom Energy fuel cells for a Wyoming project.

raw.headline: Bloom Energy Jumps 15.7% After AEP Discloses $2.65B Fuel Cell Deal
raw.summary: AEP says its unregulated unit exercised an option for up to 1,000 MW of Bloom Energy fuel cells for a Wyoming project.

headline: Bloom Energy Stock Jumps on $2.7 Billion Fuel Cell Deal. Why It Matters.
summary: American Electric Power confirms a $2.65 billion agreement to buy Bloom Energy’s solid oxide fuel cells.

raw.headline: Bloom Energy Stock Jumps on $2.7 Billion Fuel Cell Deal. Why It Matters.
raw.summary: American Electric Power confirms a $2.65 billion agreement to buy Bloom Energy’s solid oxide fuel cells.

headline: Data Center Demand Points This Stock Toward A Buy Point After Major Project Approval
summary: Bloom Energy roared above a buy point in Thursday's stock market action on a key data center project approval.

raw.headline: Data Center Demand Points This Stock Toward A Buy Point After Major Project Approval
raw.summary: Bloom Energy roared above a buy point in Thursday's stock market action on a key data center project approval.

headline: MISO selects AEP-Berkshire JV to build $1.2B, 765-kV transmission project
summary: The Midcontinent Independent System Operator also tapped Viridon to build a $350 million project in Wisconsin, with the company’s cost containment commitments overcoming concerns it may be underpriced.

raw.headline: MISO selects AEP-Berkshire JV to build $1.2B, 765-kV transmission project
raw.summary: The Midcontinent Independent System Operator also tapped Viridon to build a $350 million project in Wisconsin, with the company’s cost containment commitments overcoming concerns it may be underpriced.
